verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they came <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G967>Bethphage<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%>, <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives<s%>, he sendeth <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Go your way <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> over against <S%G2713><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> as soon as <S%G2112><s%> ye be entered <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> it <S%G846><s%> , ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> , whereon <S%G1909%G3739><s%> never <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> ; loose <S%G3089><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , and bring <S%G71><s%> him .

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , Why <S%G5101><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> ? say ye <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> they went their <S%G565>way<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied<s%> <S%G4314>by<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a place where two ways <S%G296>met<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3089>loose<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> certain of <S%G5100>them<s%> that <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> do <S%G4160>ye<s%>, <S%G3089>loosing<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1781>commanded<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G863>let<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G863>go<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G71>brought<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1911>cast<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1911>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4766>spread<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> cut <S%G2875>down<s%> <S%G4746>branches<s%> <S%G1537>off<s%> the <S%G1186>trees<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4766>strawed<s%> them <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they that went <S%G4254>before<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they that <S%G190>followed<s%>, <S%G2896>cried<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5614>Hosanna<s%>; <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>:

<S%G2127>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%>, that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G5614>Hosanna<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5310>highest<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when he had looked round about <S%G4017>upon<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, and <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G3798%G5610>eventide<s%> was <S%G5607>come<s%>, he went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%>.
¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> on the <S%G1887>morrow<s%>, when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G1831>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%>, he was <S%G3983>hungry<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> a fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> afar <S%G3113>off<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5444>leaves<s%>, he <S%G2064>came<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>haply<s%> he might <S%G2147>find<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G1722%G846>thereon<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, he <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G5444>leaves<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G4810>figs<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> yet.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>it<s%>, No man <S%G3367><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%> hereafter <S%G3371><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, and <S%G756>began<s%> to cast <S%G1544>out<s%> them that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2690>overthrew<s%> the <S%G5132>tables<s%> of the <S%G2855>moneychangers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2515>seats<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G4058>doves<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G863>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G863>suffer<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G1308>carry<s%> any <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1321>taught<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Is it <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> written <S%G1125%G3754><s%> , My <S%G3450><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%> ? but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> have made <S%G4160><s%> it <S%G846><s%> a den <S%G4693><s%> of thieves <S%G3027><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> was <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3796>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come<s%>, he <S%G1607>went<s%> out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>.
¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%>, as they passed <S%G3899>by<s%>, they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> dried <S%G3583>up<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4491>roots<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> calling to <S%G363>remembrance<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Master<s%>, <S%G2396>behold<s%>, the fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G2672>cursedst<s%> is withered <S%G3583>away<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Have <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in God <S%G2316><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> whosoever <S%G3739%G302><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> unto this <S%G5129><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> , Be thou removed <S%G142><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> be thou cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G1252><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> doubt <S%G1252><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> shall believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> shall come to pass <S%G1096><s%> ; he <S%G846><s%> shall have <S%G2071><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> he saith <S%G2036><s%> .

Therefore <S%G1223%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , What <S%G3745><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> soever <S%G302><s%> ye desire <S%G154><s%> , when ye pray <S%G4336><s%> , believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye receive <S%G2983><s%> them , and <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5213><s%> shall have <S%G2071><s%> them .

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye stand <S%G4739><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> , forgive <S%G863><s%> , if <S%G1536><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> ought <S%G1536><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> : that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> may forgive <S%G863><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> trespasses <S%G3900><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> do <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> , neither <S%G3761><s%> will <S%G863><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> trespasses <S%G3900><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, there <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1722>By<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> doest <S%G4160>thou<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>? <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, I will <S%G1905><s%> also <S%G2504><s%> ask <S%G1905><s%> of you <S%G5209><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> question <S%G3056><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> answer <S%G611><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> I will tell <S%G2046><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> .

The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> , was <S%G2258><s%> it from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%> ? answer <S%G611><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G3049>reasoned<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> we shall <S%G2036>say<s%>, <S%G1537>From<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>; he will <S%G2046>say<s%>, <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> did <S%G4100>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we shall <S%G2036>say<s%>, <S%G1537>Of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>; they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> men <S%G2192>counted<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G3689>indeed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G1492>We<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Neither <S%G3761><s%> do I <S%G1473><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> .
